xwikidoc.title: XWiki Advanced Administration Tools
xwikidoc.content:
The following pages allow advanced administration of an XWiki or XWiki farm:
{{velocity}} #if(!$xcontext.context) {{warning}}This application is not fully installed. Please visit [[ToolsInstall]] to complete it's installation{{/warning}} #end
== Configuration Tools ==
* [[XWiki Configuration Check>>CheckXWikiConfig]]: Tool to check the XWiki configuration and have recommandations. * [[Programming Rights Check>>CheckProgrammingRights]]: Tool to check that proper programming rights are set on standard pages
== Activity Tools ==
* [[Show Logs>>ShowLogs]] : Show n number of log lines * [[Show Rights>>ShowRights]]: Tool to give an overview of wiki, spaces and pages rights. * [[Flush XWiki Cache>>FlushCache]]: Tool to flush the cache
== Storage Management Tools ==
* [[Used Space>>UsedSpace]]: Tool to check the disk space used by your wikis * [[Shrink Recycle Bins>>ShrinkRecycleBins]]: tool to empty the recycle bins of your wikis * [[Database to Filesystem porter>>DB2FS]]: Move attachments to filesystem from DB (needs filesystem storage feature)
== Upgrade Tools ==
* [[Wiki Diff>>WikiDiff]]: tool to check differences between a wiki and a default XAR
== Import/Export Tools ==
* [[Export pages and spaces>>Export]] * [[Export a page from a specific date>>ExportFromDate]] * [[Export a single page>>ExportPage]] * [[Import a single page>>ImportPage]] * [[Large Export on Disk>>LargeExportBySpace]] (recommended for large wikis) * [[Large Import from Disk>>LargeImport]] (recommended for large wikis)

* [[MySQL Database Encoding Check>>CheckDBEncoding]]: Tool to check the MySQL database encoding * [[MySQL Indexes Check>>CheckIndexes]]: Tool to check MySQL indexes * [[Run Query>>Query]]: Tool to run queries on the MySQL database * [[Show Large History]]: Tool to list pages with large history * [[Show Spammed Pages]]: Tool to list spammed pages (huge number of comments) * [[Sanity Check>>SanityCheck]]: Tool to check the consistency of the database #else {{info}}It seems you're not using a MySQL Database.
